module.name: Asterisk SIP Settings
module.description: Use to configure Various Asterisk SIP and PJSIP Settings
module.changelog: *16.0.7* FREEI-2761 white space issue *16.0.6* FREEI-2761 White spaces provokes transports going off *16.0.5* FREEPBX-21970 taskprocessor_overload_trigger in pjsip.conf *16.0.4* Packaging of ver 16.0.4 *16.0.3* FREEI-1541 Revert back commit 9723a2142f6 it is not required here we are handling this in sipstation *16.0.2* FREEI-1541 Equals in turnpassword breaks SIPStation config page *16.0.1alpha* 16.0.1 alpha release
